item.description:
We're still in the early stages, and we've added an alternative date and location, so we'll still be getting to know one another. At our November meetings, we discussed the possibility of exploring the concepts proposed in "Spiritual Evolution: A Scientific Defense of Faith" by George Vaillant.
http://www.amazon.com...

An additional or alternative topic might appropriately be our reactions to and experiences as Brights during the winter solstice holiday season. There are convergent major religious rituals associated with the orbital dynamics of the Earth, with very deep cultural roots. What are the positive elements we can share and maintain our integrity? What do we eschew, and how can we do this with family and friends in a loving, supportive way, for them and for ourselves? Possible models include "Festivus" http://en.wikipedia.o... and the related, but not identical, challenges neopagans are facing:

Dar Williams - "The Christians and The Pagans"
http://www.youtube.co...
Lyrics:
http://www.guntherand...
item.name: The Cambridge Brights Meetup
